name: Elliot Schumacher
body:
I am a Masters Student at the [Language Technologies Institute](http://www.lti.cs.cmu.edu/), [School of Computer Science at Carnegie Mellon University](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/).  I work on the [DSCoVAR project](http://dscovar.org/index.html) with [Maxine Eskenazi](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~max/), [Kevyn Collins-Thompson](http://www-personal.umich.edu/~kevynct/) and others.  Before attending CMU, I received a B.S. in [Computer Science](https://cse.osu.edu/) and [Linguistics](http://linguistics.osu.edu/) from Ohio State University.

![](elliotschu.com/images/profile.png)
Here is my cv.

### Publications

####2016

* E. Schumacher, M. Eskenazi, G. Frishkoff, K. Collins-Thompson. (To appear.) Predicting the Relative Difficulty of Single Sentences With and Without Surrounding Context. _Proceedings of the 2016 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP 2016)._

### Contact Information
eschumac (at) cs.cmu.edu
